text: The Brown Bears represented Brown University in ECAC women's ice hockey during the 2015–16 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season. They were led by new head coach, Bob Kenneally. ==Offseason== *April 1: Robert Kennelley, a former men's hockey player for Brown (class of 1990), was named head coach.
